posts.post_content:
Prices include shipping.  Conditions are all over the board - please look at the scans very carefully, as a few have tears, chunks missing, pinholes, marks, etc.  Condition ranges from very poor to very good+  Feel free to make offers, but for most I will be wait to see if they sell at these prices, as I have tried to price a little below ebay average.

Lots of Polar Bear backs and some Sweet Caporal 42 and 649 overprints.  More stuff coming - better condition, more HOF'ers, more interesting backs, so check back in a couple of weeks if nothing here interests you.

Please contact using my email: lessdrama at gmail.com  DO NOT send PM's...Please.

Left-click on the 'GROUP' links to see detailed scans of each card.

e-mail sent.  lmk if you got it for 22 cards.   Thanks, Doug Bacon

All paid for have been shipped except Chance, Reulbach and Barrows - emails sent to purchasers for clarification.

List is up to date.

[quote name="Runscott" post=950188]All paid for have been shipped except Chance, Reulbach and Barrows - emails sent to purchasers for clarification.

List is up to date.[/QUOTE]

Sorry, took my bag-o-cards to the Post Office and they were closed - will ship first thing a.m.

Still plenty of these available.  The goal was to price a touch below ebay average so we both benefit.  So if my prices are off, please make offers and I'll re-check.  I did this work quickly due to volume :)

I'll be adding more as soon as this list dwindles a bit.  Also, T205's coming.

Emails only, please - lessdrama at gmail.com
Thanks Jason.  Responded and list updated.

Scott,

E-mail sent regarding Hinchman, O'Brien, Schlafly and Shaw.

Thanks.

Steve
